name: Red Racer Costume
description: WAS $51.00 - NOW $39.00 Heat up the race track with this Red Racer Costume! Costume includes: *Red jumpsuit with racing patches *Cap with embroidered racing flags This item is last of the line, and on sale due to broken zipper. Zip could be replaced by a handy stitcher, or a singlet shirt could be worn underneath with no tailoring needed. Best fit on a shorter person, measurements: Bust (if zipper were closed): 36 - 44cms Waist (if zipper were closed): 31 - 40cms Torso: 63cms Jumpsuit length: 127cms Black Racer Costumes (as well as many hundreds more styles) are available to purchase on our online store.

name: Parisian Showgirl Costume
description: WAS $69.90 - NOW $62.95 This Parisian Showgirl Costume includes: *Corset style dress with striped overskirt *Adjustable length mini skirt *Sleevelets *Hat with feather *Fingerless gloves Additional Information: Inspired by the famous Moulin Rouge cabaret The Parisian Show Girl features a functional lace-up bodice to create the perfect cleavage. The double-layered top skirt is trimmed in hot pink satin ruffles, and includes an underskirt which is adjustable from knee length to mini-skirt. This costume has been reduced in price as it is missing the bow for the back of the overskirt. Detachable bow was kept in place by velcro, a person handy with a needle and thread maybe able to whip one together or the costume is just fine without it. The rest of the costume is in perfect condition, you will be doing the Can Can in no time! Staff and fishnet tights sold separately. Complete Parisian Showgirl costumes and accessories (as well as many hundreds more costumes) are available to purchase on our online store. If this is not your size but you simply couldn't do without this costume at this price, give us a call and we might be able to help you! SIZE CHART

name: Star Wars Deluxe Jawa Costume
description:
WAS $74.55 - NOW $66.95 I can't abide Jawa's. Disgusting Creatures!
This Deluxe Star Wars Jawa Costume includes:
*Hooded mask
*Long robe
*Latex double bandolier
Additional Information:
Gloves not included This costume has been reduced in price as it is deemed a 'second' by our stringent quality assurance checks due to the light up eyes not lighting up. The rest of the costume is in perfect condition and a clever electronics person would possibly be able to restore this dull-eyed Jawa to it's previous perfection. Or you could use the tips on this website to fix them - Fix Jawa Eyes!
Complete working Jawa costumes (as well as many hundreds more styles) are available to purchase on our online store. SIZE CHART
